content.intro:
I’m a Computer Science student at the Technical University of Munich, now in my fifth semester.
My main tools are Vue, React, JavaScript, Tailwind, HTML and CSS, but I’ve also worked with Java, Python, C++, OCaml and MySQL.
content.motivation: What I love most about technology is how accessible it is. I can experiment, create, and learn whenever I want. I enjoy improving my skills and I’m taking courses in AI, applying what I learn to a university project focused on enhancing language education.
